Chapter on Entering the Inconceivable Liberation Realm and the Vows of Samantabhadra

At that time, the youth Sudhana single-mindedly contemplated the teachings of the night spirit, and understood the pure mind of enlightenment that the spirit had first given rise to, the treasury of bodhisattvas that was born, the vows made by bodhisattvas, the perfections of bodhisattvas that were purified, the stages of bodhisattva abodes that were entered, the practices cultivated by bodhisattvas, the path of renunciation practiced, the ocean of light of omniscience that was followed, the mind that universally saves all beings that was aroused, the great compassion that arose like a cloud to universally cover all, and the ability to always give rise to the vows of Samantabhadra throughout all buddha-lands until the end of the future.
Gradually traveling, he went to the night spirit, bowed his head at her feet, circumambulated her countless times, and then stood in front of her with palms joined, saying:
Holy One!
I have already generated the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, but I do not yet know how bodhisattvas practice the bodhisattva grounds,
how they give rise to the bodhisattva grounds,
and how they accomplish the bodhisattva grounds.
The night spirit replied, Excellent, excellent!
Good man!
You have already been able to generate the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, and you are also able to ask about the practice, arising, and accomplishment of the bodhisattva grounds.
Good man!
If bodhisattvas are endowed with ten qualities, they will be able to perfect all bodhisattva practices.

fifth, knowing that each pore of the tathÄgatas emits an ocean of great light equal to the number of sentient beings, benefiting all;
sixth, seeing that each pore of the tathÄgatas emits an ocean of flames of light with the colors of various jewels;
seventh, moment by moment manifesting an ocean of buddhas' transformations, pervading the Dharma realm, taming sentient beings;
eighth, attaining the ocean of the Buddha's voice and the sounds of the languages of all sentient beings, able to turn the wheel of the Dharma of the buddhas of the three times;
ninth, knowing the immeasurable ocean of all buddhas' names;
tenth, knowing all buddhas' inconceivable sovereign power in taming sentient beings.
Good man!
Bodhisattvas who are endowed with these ten qualities are able to perfect the practices of all bodhisattvas.
Good man!

I have attained the bodhisattva liberation called the heroic Dharma door of universal walking in the bliss of tranquil meditation, and I see all buddhas of the three times everywhere, and also see the pure lands, assemblies at the sites of enlightenment, and oceans of samÄdhi and supernormal powers of those buddhas, their various names, teachings, lifespans, voices, physical characteristics, and various differences filling the Dharma realm, all clearly seen;

Because I know that the TathÄgatas do not come, because the courses of the world are eternally extinguished;

they are not real, because they abide in illusory dharmas;
they are not false, because they benefit sentient beings;

they are not destroyed, because their nature is always unchanging;

Signless, because the nature and characteristics are originally empty.

When I know all thus-come ones in this way, I discern, understand, accomplish, increase, contemplate, observe, firmly adorn, and universally illuminate various realms through the bodhisattva's courageous liberation gate of universal walking in the bliss of tranquil meditation.
